Project 01.description: Fjall is a cloud architecture tool to deploy infrastructure in under 30 minutes, transforming a once time-intensive process into something effortless. Inspired by the idea of 'working above the cloud', the brand and digital experience embody lightness, clarity, and calm focus - through spacious layouts, soft colours, and Mid Century Modern inspired illustrations that blend nostalgic charm with modern depth and motion to make complex technology feel intuitive and elegant. As Lead Designer on the project.

Project 02.description: Aurora is a digital platform for immersive experiences. The project focused on crafting a clean, intuitive interface that reflects the brand’s modern identity, while animations and motion elements enhance user engagement. Lead Designer on all branding and UI/UX design aspects.
